title: himAcala tanaya
sahitya:
himAcala tanaya brOcuTakidi  manci samayamu rAvE amba


anupallavi

  kumAra janani samAnamevarilanu mAnavati shrI bhrannAyakI


caraNam 1    sarOjamukhi birAna nIvu varAlosagumani nEnu vEDiti 
purAri hari surEndranuta purANi parAmukhamElanE talli
    caraNam 2    umA hamsagamanA tAmasamA brOva dikkevaru nikkamuganu 
mAkipuDabhimAnamu cUpa bhAramA vinumA dayatOnu
    caraNam 3    sadA natavaradAyakI nija dAsuDanu shyAmakrSNa sOdari 
gadA moravinavA durita vidAriNi shrI brhannAyakI
